meanings.sent1: The leafleteer handed out flyers on the street corner.
meanings.sent2: The leafleteer distributed pamphlets at the event.
meanings.sent3: The leafleteer made sure everyone got a leaflet, even the pigeons!
meanings.sent4: The leafleteer was like a paper messenger, spreading information far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The image of the leafleteer with arms full of leaflets stuck in my mind.

meanings.sent1: She leafleteers in the park every weekend.
meanings.sent2: They leafleteer for their cause passionately.
meanings.sent3: He leafleteers with such enthusiasm, it's contagious!
meanings.sent4: The wind leafleteered the flyers across the town like confetti.
meanings.sent5: The group decided to leafleteer the neighborhood to raise awareness.
